181 enum class DebugDrawFlag {
182  kDrawAxes = 1 << 0,
183  kDrawGrid = 1 << 1,
184  kDrawBoundingBoxes = 1 << 2
185 };
186 MAKE_FLAGS(DebugDrawFlag, DebugDrawFlags)
187 MAKE_BITWISE(DebugDrawFlag)

210 class DebugManager: public Manager, public Serializable {
211  Q_OBJECT
212 public:
213  //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
216 
219  struct DebugRenderable {
220  //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
223  DebugRenderable() {
224  }
225  DebugRenderable(const std::shared_ptr<Renderable>& renderable,
226  ShaderProgram* shaderProgram,
227  const std::shared_ptr<Object>& object,
228  float duration = -1):
229  m_renderable(renderable),
230  m_shaderProgram(shaderProgram),
231  m_object(object),
232  m_durationInSecs(duration)
233  {
234  if (m_durationInSecs > 0.0f) {
235  m_timer.start();
236  }
237  }
238  ~DebugRenderable() {
239 
240  }
241 
243 
244 
245  //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
248 
250  bool isDone() const{
251  if(m_durationInSecs > 0 && (m_timer.elapsed()/1000.0) > m_durationInSecs){
252  return true;
253  }
254  else {
255  return false;
256  }
257  }
258 
260  void draw();
261 
263  std::shared_ptr<Object> object() const{
264  if (std::shared_ptr<Object> strongPtr = m_object.lock()) {
265  return strongPtr;
266  }
267  else {
268  return nullptr;
269  }
270  }
271 
273 
274  //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
277 
279  std::shared_ptr<Renderable> m_renderable;
280 
281  ShaderProgram* m_shaderProgram;
282 
284  std::weak_ptr<Object> m_object;
285 
287  float m_durationInSecs;
288 
289  QElapsedTimer m_timer;
290 
291  bool m_enabled;
292 
294  };
